com.mesosphere.sdk.http.queries

Class ConfigQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.queries.ConfigQueries

  • public final class ConfigQueries
extends java.lang.Object
    A read-only API for accessing active and inactive configurations from persistent storage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Configuration>
      Response      		 getConfiguration(ConfigStore<T> configStore, java.lang.String configurationId)
      Produces the content of the provided configuration ID, or returns an error if that ID doesn't exist or the data couldn't be read.
      static <T extends Configuration>
      Response      		 getConfigurationIds(ConfigStore<T> configStore)
      Produces an ID listing of all stored configurations.
      static <T extends Configuration>
      Response      		 getTarget(ConfigStore<T> configStore)
      Produces the content of the current target configuration, or returns an error if reading that data failed.
      static <T extends Configuration>
      Response      		 getTargetId(ConfigStore<T> configStore)
      Produces the ID of the current target configuration, or returns an error if reading that data failed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getConfigurationIds

        public static <T extends Configuration> Response getConfigurationIds(ConfigStore<T> configStore)
        Produces an ID listing of all stored configurations.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The configuration type which is being stored by the service.

      • getConfiguration

        public static <T extends Configuration> Response getConfiguration(ConfigStore<T> configStore,
                                                                  java.lang.String configurationId)
        Produces the content of the provided configuration ID, or returns an error if that ID doesn't exist or the data couldn't be read.

      • getTargetId

        Produces the ID of the current target configuration, or returns an error if reading that data failed.

        public static <T extends Configuration> Response getTarget(ConfigStore<T> configStore)
        Produces the content of the current target configuration, or returns an error if reading that data failed.
